snippet: At issue for the Supreme Court is the extent to which the drug a defendant sold factored into a death. A mandatory 20-year sentence is being appealed.
abstract: Supreme Court weighs mandatory sentencing in drug case, and the extent to which a defendant can be held responsible if drug he sold may have factored into, but was not necessarily the primary cause of, a fatal overdose.
lead_paragraph: At issue for the Supreme Court is the extent to which the drug a defendant sold factored into a death. A mandatory 20-year sentence is being appealed.

headline.main: Justices Weigh Role Drug Played in a Fatal Cocktail
headline.print_headline: Justices Weigh Role Drug Played in a Fatal Cocktail
